LanguageData.UGM_AllowMischievousGeeseDesc:
Enable to let geese partake in tomfoolery.

This means geese can steal items from storage and move them around. Protect your valuable. Oh... and geese will be able to open doors.

(Colonists can be ordered to stop the goose.)
LanguageData.UGM_AllowTyrannicalGeeseDesc:
Enable to let geese periodically chase and terrorize children.

Don't worry, it builds character.

(Colonists can be ordered to stop the goose.)
LanguageData.UGM_ShooGooseAwaySuccessChanceDesc: Adjusting this slider alters the initial success chance for a colonist to shoo away a pawn. If set to 1.0 then the secondary chance check is bypassed entirely. (Secondary chance is based on pawn's Animals skill level.)
